ai-patthana7.17:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles consisting in thoughts.
ai-patthana7.17:1.1_1: Neither things don’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana7.17:1.1_2: and thoughts don’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana7.17:2.1_1: Not knowing the Teaching, the Buddha doesn’t give rise to the cause,
ai-patthana7.17:2.1_2: nor do consciousness arise dependent on the Buddha, etc., arise with cause and reasons.
ai-patthana7.17:3.1_0: Not understanding the teaching, and there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana7.17:3.1_1: and not the causes of those who don’t give rise to the teaching. But there is no cause or condition for the sake of robes.
ai-patthana7.17:3.1_2: and without giving rise to a thought, (wholesome) things don’t arise because of cause or condition.
ai-patthana7.17:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
